00033 const GLfloat light_specular[] = { 1.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f };

00037 const GLfloat mat_diffuse[]    = { 0.8f, 0.8f, 0.8f, 1.0f };

00058 //Stole this from Code::Blocks default
00059 static void resize(int width, int height)
00060 {
00061     const float ar = (float) width / (float) height;
00062 
00063     glViewport(0, 0, width, height);
00064 
00065     //Set up projection mode here. It is apparently safe to use glFrustum and gluLookAt
00066     glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION);
00067     glLoadIdentity();
00068     glFrustum(-ar, ar, -1.0, 1.0, 2.0, 100.0);
00069     gluLookAt(5,5,5,0,0,0,0,0,1);
00070 
00071     glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW);
00072     glLoadIdentity() ;
00073 }

00080 //Displays the object - I am moving the camera in the function - Oscillates in a circle around the z-axis
00081 void display() {
00082     glClear(GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT | GL_DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT);
00083     myCamera->doGlSetDisp();
00084 
00085     /* Draw Coordinate Axes * /
00086     glPushMatrix();
00087         drawCoordAxes(5);
00088     glPopMatrix();
00089     /*                      */
00090 
00091     glPushMatrix();
00092         glRotated(theta, 0, 1, 0);
00093         glColor3f(1.0, 1.0, 0.0);
00094         myMesh->drawMesh();
00095         glColor3f(1.0, 0.0, 0.0);
00096         //glutSolidSphere(1, 20, 20);
00097     glPopMatrix();
00098 
00099     glutSwapBuffers();
00100 }

00102 void init() {
00103     glClearColor(1.0, 1.0, 1.0, 0.0);
00104     //glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION);
00105     //glLoadIdentity();
00106     //glFrustum(-4.0, 4.0, -4.0, 4.0, 1, 4.0);
00107     //glTranslated(0,0,4);
00108     glColor3f(1.0, 0.0, 0.0);
00109 
00110     //Stuff from sample
00111     glEnable(GL_CULL_FACE);
00112     glCullFace(GL_BACK);
00113 
00114     glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
00115     glDepthFunc(GL_LESS);
00116     glEnable(GL_NORMALIZE); //Automatically rescale normals to make them unit length
00117     glEnable(GL_COLOR_MATERIAL);
00118 
00119     /* Enable lighting */
00120     glEnable(GL_LIGHT0);
00121     glEnable(GL_LIGHTING);
00122 
00123     glLightfv(GL_LIGHT0, GL_AMBIENT,  light_ambient);
00124     glLightfv(GL_LIGHT0, GL_DIFFUSE,  light_diffuse);
00125     glLightfv(GL_LIGHT0, GL_SPECULAR, light_specular);
00126     glLightfv(GL_LIGHT0, GL_POSITION, light_position);
00127 
00128     glMaterialfv(GL_FRONT, GL_AMBIENT,   mat_ambient);
00129     glMaterialfv(GL_FRONT, GL_DIFFUSE,   mat_diffuse);
00130     glMaterialfv(GL_FRONT, GL_SPECULAR,  mat_specular);
00131     glMaterialfv(GL_FRONT, GL_SHININESS, high_shininess);
00132     /* */
00133 
00134     // enable color tracking
00135     glEnable(GL_COLOR_MATERIAL);
00136     glColorMaterial(GL_FRONT_AND_BACK, GL_AMBIENT_AND_DIFFUSE);
00137 
00138     //init functor
00139     myFunctor = new Delta_Functor(glutGet(GLUT_ELAPSED_TIME) + 1000, glutGet(GLUT_ELAPSED_TIME) + 6000, 0, 360, 1);
00140     //myFunctor->reverse();
00141     myFunctor->makeCyclic();
00142 
00143     //Init mesh
00144     printf("Making a mesh now...\n");
00145     myMesh = new Mesh();
00146     myMesh->loadObj("./proog.obj");
00147 
00148     //Init camera
00149     myCamera = new Camera(Point3(5,5,5), Point3(0,0,0), Point3(0,0,1));
00150     myCamera->setFrustum(-1, 1, -1, 1, 2, 100);
00151 }
00152 
00153 //This function is called when no events are pending.
00154 void myidle() {
00155     theta = myFunctor->getValue();
00156     //printf("Time elapsed is %i, theta is %d\n", glutGet(GLUT_ELAPSED_TIME), theta);
00157     if (theta >= 360.0)
00158         theta -= 360.0;
00159     else if (theta <= 0.0)
00160         theta += 360.0;
00161     glutPostRedisplay();
00162 }
00163 
00164 void mykey(unsigned char key, int x, int y) {
00165     if(key == 'q')
00166         exit(0);
00167     else if (key == 'd')
00168         setDrawFigureMode();
00169     else if (key == '+')
00170         myCamera->zoomIn(0.95);
00171     else if (key == '-')
00172         myCamera->zoomIn(1.05);
00173     else if (key == '4')
00174         myCamera->spinAroundCenter(0,-PI/10.0);
00175     else if (key == '6')
00176         myCamera->spinAroundCenter(0,PI/10.0);
00177     else if (key == '8')
00178         myCamera->spinAroundCenter(PI/10.0,0);
00179     else if (key == '2')
00180         myCamera->spinAroundCenter(-PI/10.0,0);
00181 }
00182 
00183 void mymouse(int button, int state, int x, int y)
00184 {
00185     if (button == GLUT_LEFT_BUTTON && state == GLUT_DOWN)
00186     {
00187         clickPosition = Point3((x - WIDTH)/(WIDTH/2.0),(y - WIDTH)/(WIDTH/2.0),0);
00188     }
00189 }
00190 
00191 void mymotion(int x, int y)
00192 {
00193     double shiftx = clickPosition.x - (x - WIDTH)/(WIDTH/2.0);
00194     double shifty = clickPosition.y - (y - WIDTH)/(WIDTH/2.0);
00195     clickPosition = Point3((x - WIDTH)/(WIDTH/2.0),(y - WIDTH)/(WIDTH/2.0),0);
00196     myCamera->spinAroundCenter(-shifty*MOUSE_SENSITIVITY, shiftx*MOUSE_SENSITIVITY);
00197 }

00199 //This will draw the coordinate axes, which is nice
00200 void drawCoordAxes(double length)
00201 {
00202     glPushMatrix();
00203         glBegin(GL_LINES);
00204             glColor3f(0,0,1);
00205             glLineWidth(2.0);
00206             glVertex3f(0,0,0);
00207             glVertex3f(0,0,length);
00208 
00209             glColor3f(0,1,0);
00210             glVertex3f(0,0,0);
00211             glVertex3f(0,length,0);
00212 
00213             glColor3f(1,0,0);
00214             glVertex3f(0,0,0);
00215             glVertex3f(length,0,0);
00216         glEnd();
00217     glPopMatrix();
00218 }

00220 //Create the mesh from the points in points
00221 void createMesh()
00222 {
00223     if (myMesh != NULL)
00224     {
00225         delete myMesh;
00226     }
00227     myMesh = new Mesh();
00228     for (int degree = 0; degree < 360; degree += 10)
00229     {
00230         for (int i = 0; i < points.size() - 1; i++)
00231         {
00232             vector<Point3> face;
00233             face.push_back(Point3(points[i + 1].x * cos(degree * 3.14159/180), points[i + 1].x * sin(degree * 3.14159/180), points[i + 1].y));
00234             face.push_back(Point3(points[i].x * cos(degree * 3.14159/180), points[i].x * sin(degree * 3.14159/180), points[i].y));
00235             face.push_back(Point3(points[i].x * cos((degree + 10) * 3.14159/180), points[i].x * sin((degree + 10) * 3.14159/180), points[i].y));
00236             face.push_back(Point3(points[i + 1].x * cos((degree + 10) * 3.14159/180), points[i + 1].x * sin((degree + 10) * 3.14159/180), points[i + 1].y));
00237             myMesh->addFace(face);
00238             vector<Point3> reverseFace;
00239             for (int j = 0; j < face.size(); j++)
00240             {
00241                 reverseFace.push_back(face[face.size() - 1 - j]);
00242             }
00243             myMesh->addFace(reverseFace);
00244         }
00245     }
00246 }

00248 //Set the mode to where you are drawing a new figure in 2d
00249 void setDrawFigureMode()
00250 {
00251     points.resize(0);
00252 
00253     //Set new callback functions
00254     glutReshapeFunc(drawFigureResize);
00255     glutKeyboardFunc(drawFigureKeyHandler);
00256     glutMouseFunc(drawFigureMouseHandler);
00257     glutMotionFunc(NULL);
00258     glutDisplayFunc(drawFigureDisplayHandler);
00259     glutIdleFunc(drawFigureIdleHandler);
00260 
00261     drawFigureResize(800, 800);
00262 }
00263 
00264 void setViewFigureMode()
00265 {
00266     glutReshapeFunc(resize);
00267     glutKeyboardFunc(mykey);
00268     glutMouseFunc(mymouse);
00269     glutMotionFunc(mymotion);
00270     glutDisplayFunc(display);
00271     glutIdleFunc(myidle);
00272 
00273     resize(800, 800);
00274 }

00276 void drawFigureResize(int width, int height)
00277 {
00278     const float ar = (float) width / (float) height;
00279 
00280     glViewport(0, 0, width, height);
00281 
00282     //Set up projection mode here. It is apparently safe to use glFrustum and gluLookAt
00283     glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION);
00284     glLoadIdentity();
00285     gluOrtho2D(-1.0, 1.0, -1.0, 1.0);
00286     //gluLookAt(0, -1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1);
00287 
00288     glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW);
00289     glLoadIdentity() ;
00290 }

00292 void drawFigureKeyHandler(unsigned char key, int x, int y)
00293 {
00294     if(key == 'q')
00295         exit(0);\
00296     else if (key == 'd')
00297     {
00298         createMesh();
00299         setViewFigureMode();
00300     }
00301 }

00303 void drawFigureMouseHandler(int button, int state, int x, int y)
00304 {
00305     if (button == GLUT_LEFT_BUTTON && state == GLUT_DOWN)
00306     {
00307         points.push_back(Point3((x - WIDTH/2.0)/(double)(WIDTH/2.0), (-y + HEIGHT/2.0)/(double)(HEIGHT/2.0), 0.0));
00308         printf("Clicked at %i, %i, corresponding to point %f, %f, %f\n", x, y, (x - WIDTH/2.0)/(double)(WIDTH/2.0), (-y + HEIGHT/2.0)/(double)(HEIGHT/2.0), 0.0);
00309     }
00310 }

00312 void drawFigureDisplayHandler()
00313 {
00314     glClear(GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT | GL_DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT);
00315 
00316     /* Draw Coordinate Axes * /
00317     glPushMatrix();
00318         drawCoordAxes(5);
00319     glPopMatrix();
00320     /*                      */
00321 
00322     //Draw a vertical line down the middle
00323     glPushMatrix();
00324         glColor3f(0, 0, 0);
00325         glBegin(GL_LINES);
00326             glVertex3d(0,-1,0);
00327             glVertex3d(0,1,0);
00328         glEnd();
00329     glPopMatrix();
00330 
00331     glPushMatrix();
00332         glColor3f(1.0, 0.0, 0.0);
00333         glBegin(GL_LINE_STRIP);
00334             for (int i = 0; i < points.size(); i++)
00335             {
00336                 points[i].doVertex();
00337             }
00338         glEnd();
00339     glPopMatrix();
00340 
00341     glutSwapBuffers();
00342 }

00349 int main(int argc, char** argv) {
00350     printf("some random numbers: %i, %i, %i, %i, %i\n", rand()%5, rand()%5, rand()%5, rand()%5, rand()%5);
00351     glutInit(&argc, argv);
00352     glutInitDisplayMode(GLUT_DOUBLE | GLUT_RGB | GLUT_DEPTH);
00353     glutInitWindowSize(800, 800);
00354     glutInitWindowPosition(0, 0);
00355     glutCreateWindow("Mesher");
00356 
00357     //Set callback functions
00358     setViewFigureMode();
00359 
00360     init(); //Initialize everything
00361 
00362     //Enter main loop
00363     glutMainLoop();
00364 
00365     return 0;
00366 }
